text: Punk in Drublic is the fourth studio album by American punk rock band, NOFX. Punk in Drublic was released on July 19, 1994. The producers of the album were Ryan Greene and Fat Mike. It is NOFX's most successful album and peaked at #12 on Billboard's Heatseekers chart. ==Songs== Category:1994 albums Category:NOFX albums Category:Punk albums
title: Punk in Drublic
